message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.IR, cs.HC

Reasoning: 
- cs.CL (Computation and Language): The paper discusses the use of natural language processing techniques to enhance the summarization experience in video lectures.
- cs.LG (Machine Learning): The paper proposes the use of convolutional neural networks to support the interactive summarizing model.
- cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition): The paper applies automatic slide localization technology to lecture videos, which involves computer vision techniques.
- cs.IR (Information Retrieval): The paper discusses the possibility of using learning analytics to support the video lecture learning process, which involves information retrieval techniques.
- cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction): The paper focuses on enhancing the learning experience of learners in video lectures, which involves human-computer interaction techniques.
